content.rendered:
• JEE Main 2022 Exam to be held in two sessions: in April & May
  • The first phase of JEE Mains 2022 will be conducted from 16 to 17 April While the Second phase is scheduled from 24 to 29 May
  • Last date to fill the JEE Main 2022 application form for the first session is 31 March 2022
  • Applications Check the official website for details on JEE Main 2022 at jeemain.nta.nic.in
